description:
Large, sunny junior 1 bedroom at the top floor of quiet, art deco building in the heart of Brooklyn. Only 2 blocks to express trains and walking distance to Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum & the Botanical Gardens.

Open, sunny, high ceiling apartment with lots of light and art deco detailing.

The entire apartment

Blocks away from Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum & Gardens. Active area with lots of great coffee shops, bars & restaurants. Lots of great Caribbean food!

1 block to express 4,5 & 1,2 trains. Two bus stops are directly in front of the building.
name: Sunny Apartment in Brooklyn near park & museum
review: The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
